abstract.p: Promotion Marketing Association names Robert W Fallon chairman and president for one-year term; Advertising Women of New York re-elects Ellen Flahive as president for second one-year term; Advertising Club of New York re-elects Carla Loffredo as president and Robert Mate as first vice president, each for one-year term; New York chapter of American Marketing Association names Lou Moskowitz president for one-year term (S)

block.p: The Promotion Marketing Association, New York, named Robert W. Fallon chairman and president for a one-year term. He is a partner and chief marketing officer at the Millennium Lifestyle Marketing Group, Boston, part of Devine & Pearson.

The Promotion Marketing Association, New York, named Robert W. Fallon chairman and president for a one-year term. He is a partner and chief marketing officer at the Millennium Lifestyle Marketing Group, Boston, part of Devine & Pearson.

* Advertising Women of New York re-elected Ellen Flahive as president for a second one-year term. Ms. Flahive is publisher of the American Park Network, New York, part of the Meredith Corp. * The Advertising Club of New York, re-elected Carla Loffredo as president and Robert Mate as first vice president, each for a one-year term. Ms. Loffredo is director for strategic planning at MindShare, the media services joint venture of two units of the WPP Group: Ogilvy & Mather Worldwide and J. Walter Thompson. Robert Mate is vice president and publishing director at the Meredith Corp. * The New York chapter of the American Marketing Association, named Lou Moskowitz president for a one-year term. He is president at Results Thru Research.
